scripts.build-mac: bun build ./index.ts --compile --minify --sourcemap --target bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile=./dist/dp_bundler-mac_arm && bun build ./index.ts --compile --minify --sourcemap --target bun-darwin-x64 --outfile=./dist/dp_bundler-mac_x64
scripts.build-linux: bun build ./index.ts --compile --minify --sourcemap --target bun-linux-x64 --outfile=./dist/dp_bundler-linux_x64 && bun build ./index.ts --compile --minify --sourcemap --target bun-linux-arm64 --outfile=./dist/dp_bundler-linux_arm
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && bun run build-mac && bun run build-windows && bun run build-linux
